special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
After a standard system update you need to restart any applications that
use Subversion, such as Apache when using mod_dav_svn, to make all the
necessary changes.
threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the service to crash, leading to a denial of service.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the service to consume all available resources, leading to a denial of service.
